ABOUT_WHO_WE_ARE: De un proveedor de tarjetas de recarga a un proveedor global de soluciones de tarjetas de extremo a extremo
CAREERS_CONTENT: FutureCard provides employment opportunities for talented people. If you want to make a future for yourself in the card management solution industry, FutureCard is the ideal company for you. We are continuously looking for new and ambitious people to recruit in different departments of our company. Below you will find our recent job openings. If you cannot find the right position for you, kindly provide us your contact details through the below form and upload your resume.
ABOUT_US_CONTENT_0: La trayectoria de FutureCard de más de 17 años comenzó como miembro del Grupo ENPI en 2002, con la entrega de tarjetas de recarga a las operaciones de telecomunicaciones. Pronto la empresa obtuvo la certificación ISO9001 en reconocimiento de las normas de gestión de calidad. En 2002, FutureCard Industries LLC fue fundada y se convirtió en un fabricante certificado de tarjetas de pago por Visa y Mastercard. Los años siguientes estuvieron marcados por la continua adquisición de clientes y la significativa expansión de la cartera de productos de tarjetas Visa EMV a tarjetas de doble interfaz, metro sin contacto, identificación policarbonatada - con características de alta seguridad y tarjetas inteligentes para la salud - al tiempo que se introducían servicios y soluciones gestionadas de HCE, identificación y tarjetas de pago. Otro hito alcanzado por FutureCard fue la obtención de los Certificados ISO14001, para la Gestión Medioambiental e ISO18001, para la Seguridad y Salud Ocupacional. En 2018 FutureCard abrió las puertas de su fábrica de pleno derecho con la disponibilidad de producir hasta 10 millones de tarjetas de plástico al mes.
ABOUT_US_CONTENT_1: Hoy en día somos conocidos como un proveedor pionero global de soluciones de tarjetas End-to-End para pagos, ID, transporte, telecomunicaciones, fidelización y venta al por menor, entre otros. Estamos sirviendo a un mercado exigente en constante crecimiento con tarjetas innovadoras, tarjetas inteligentes, así como servicios y soluciones de cumplimiento de tarjetas. Agencias gubernamentales, instituciones financieras, operadores de telecomunicaciones, corporaciones y otros negocios en todo el mundo nos confían la delicada misión de producir tarjetas seguras, que llevan sus marcas, identifican a sus clientes y autentican sus transacciones.
ABOUT_US_CONTENT_2: Today we are known as a pioneering global End-to-End card solutions provider for payments, ID, transport, telecom, loyalty and retail among others. We are serving a demanding market which is in constant surge by providing innovative cards, smartcards, as well as other card fulfillment services and solutions. Government agencies, financial institutions, telecom operators, corporates and other businesses throughout the world trust us with the delicate mission of producing secure cards, which carry their brands, identify their clients, and authenticate their transactions.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION: Aspiramos a superar las expectativas de nuestros clientes demostrando los más altos estándares de integridad, profesionalismo y dedicación a la excelencia en el desempeño.
ABOUT_US_FACILITY_CONTENT: Superficie: 7.100 m2. Fábrica, oficina de personalización, Fulfillment House, In-House Design hasta 10 millones de tarjetas de plástico al mes que pueden incluir 5 millones de tarjetas EMV.

ABOUT_OUR_FACILITY: Infórmese en esta página sobre nuestras instalaciones y capacidades de producción
ABOUT_US_MARKETS: Desde su creación en 2002, FutureCard atiende a una amplia base de clientes en los seis continentes. Las industrias de nuestros clientes son finanzas, gobierno, transporte, telecomunicaciones, seguros, salud, educación, comercio minorista y muchas más.
ABOUT_US_PRODUCTS: Como fabricante de tarjetas de extremo a extremo, que mezcla la tecnología con la artesanía de la impresión de seguridad, FutureCard cubre toda la cadena de valor del diseño y la fabricación de tarjetas seguras en todo tipo de sustratos: PC, PET-F, PET-G, PVC, ABS, PS, cartón, etc., permitiendo satisfacer las necesidades de todos los mercados de tarjetas estéticas y tarjetas inteligentes seguras.
ABOUT_US_SERVICES: FutureCard completa su oferta con servicios y soluciones complementarias de tarjetas, posicionándose como una ventanilla única para todas las necesidades de tarjetas. Las empresas y los proveedores de servicios confían a FutureCard la delicada misión de externalizar las operaciones de sus tarjetas desde el concepto hasta la entrega.
ABOUT_US_CONTENT: FutureCard es un proveedor global de tarjetas innovadoras, tarjetas inteligentes, así como de servicios y soluciones de cumplimiento de tarjetas, que atiende a un mercado exigente en constante crecimiento. Agencias gubernamentales, instituciones financieras, operadores de telecomunicaciones, corporaciones y otros negocios en todo el mundo nos confían la delicada misión de producir tarjetas seguras, que llevan sus marcas, identifican a sus clientes y autentican sus transacciones.
APP_DESCRIPTION: Desde su creación en 2002, FutureCard ha diseñado, fabricado y personalizado tarjetas para bancos, gobiernos, operadores y minoristas de todo el mundo.
CARDS_DESCRIPTION: FutureCard personaliza todas y cada una de las tarjetas para que se ajusten al objetivo particular para el que se utilizarán.... Por lo tanto, cuando se trata de material tecnológico, el material de la tarjeta, así como del diseño y las características de seguridad, nuestro objetivo es ofrecerle la mejor tecnología, el diseño y la funcionalidad que se adapte a sus necesidades.
CARDS_DESIGN_CONTENT_0: FutureCard provides its customers with cards that offer a unique amalgamation of the most sophisticated design and security features. Due to the sensitive nature of the information on our smartcards, we use the latest encryption systems to ensure a high level of security to prevent the information from being misused. At the same time, we also make a conscious effort to make our cards aesthetically pleasing and practical to carry around by working with our in-house design team.
CARDS_DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: FutureCard tiene la capacidad de fabricación de materiales y efectos especiales:
CARDS_DESIGN_SUBTITLE: Vea a continuación nuestras opciones de diseño de tarjetas
CARDS_MATERIALS_CONTENT_0: Choosing the right card material is very important when it comes to the functioning of the card and the purpose that it is meant to serve. Clients need to determine how they expect the card to be used, whether they want to make it easy to carry around, and if the card has to be used over a long period. At FutureCard, we cater to each customer's specific requirements and adapt the materials to come up with a design that they find suitable.
CARDS_MATERIALS_CONTENT_1: The card materials used by FutureCard must fulfill many special criteria for the respective applications of the card. Our clients have the option to choose between a variety of different card materials. We provide our customers with the opportunity of choosing between paper, plastic and metal cards for their business.
CARDS_MATERIALS_DESCRIPTION: Los materiales de las tarjetas se suministran como láminas para el laminado o como granulados para el moldeo por inyección de las tarjetas.
CARDS_MATERIALS_SUBTITLE: Compruebe a continuación el material disponible para sus tarjetas
CARDS_TECHNOLOGY_CONTENT_0: Los avances en la tecnología allanaron el camino para tarjetas inteligentes seguras y confiables que dominan los diferentes sectores del gobierno, transporte, salud, comercio minorista, telecomunicaciones e industrias financieras. Dependiendo de la industria y el uso de tarjetas inteligentes, estos productos se rigen por numerosos estándares globales como ISO, EMVCo, GlobalPlatform y GSMA, entre otros.
CARDS_TECHNOLOGY_CONTENT_1: La implementación de los últimos estándares de encriptación de datos y las características de seguridad física son imprescindibles para verificar la autenticidad de los titulares de las tarjetas, el uso y las transacciones. Las instalaciones y procesos de FutureCard están certificados y auditados por entidades líderes de la industria como PCI, Visa, MasterCard, UPI, GSMA para garantizar que todos estos avances tecnológicos, procedimientos y estándares se implementen con un cumplimiento de calidad y seguridad excepcional.
CARDS_TECHNOLOGY_CONTENT_2: To enable safe and secure storing and processing of a diverse range of data and applications, we offer our customers the following physical electronic authorization device technologies:
CONTACT_SUBTITLE: Gracias por su interés en FutureCard.
LANDING_SUBTITLE: Desde su creación en 2002, FutureCard ha diseñado, fabricado y personalizado tarjetas para bancos, gobiernos, operadores y minoristas de todo el mundo.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_PAYMENT: Governments and public services providers trust FutureCard with the production and personalization of their cards used for identification, voting, transport, and many other public services applications.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_IDENTIFICATION: Being a certified MasterCard™, Visa™, and UnionPay™ card manufacturer, and a certified PCI/DSS card personalization bureau, we serve Banks and financial institutions with all their payment cards needs.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_TRANSPORT&ACCESS: FutureCard serves Mobile and Fixed Telecom Network Operators with hundreds of millions of SIM/USIM, Payphone cards, as well as with variety of scratch recharge vouchers in standard and customized formats.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_TELECOM: Commercial Institutions, retailers and Corporations employ FutureCard in order to reflect their brand image and secure their customers' loyalty in customized cards with a myriad of security and aesthetic features.
MARKETS_DESCRIPTION_LOYALTY&RETAIL: Commercial Institutions, retailers and Corporations employ FutureCard in order to reflect their brand image and secure their customers' loyalty in customized cards with a myriad of security and aesthetic features.

NEWS_CONTENT: Stay updated with the latest news and happening around the world of FutureCard. As FutureCard is part of some of the most exciting ventures in the world of technology, keep yourself informed to see our latest collaborations and product offerings.

SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_0: El embalaje es tan importante como su contenido, Future Card cuenta con una amplia gama de productos que se adaptan a todas las necesidades, y utiliza una gran variedad de materiales, entre los que se incluyen el cartón y los materiales plásticos.  Puede elegir entre una gran variedad de opciones de embalaje.
SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_1: Cards packed in the traditional fashion using an automated machines with an attractive design and finishing.
SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_2: High End Gift boxes give a satisfaction and allow space for additional information about the cards.
SERVICES_FULFILLMENT_CONTENT_4: One of our bestselling fulfillment packaging in the market we customize your prepaid cards with matching designs and it can contain basic information about the program.
SERVICES_PERSONALIZATION_SUBTITLE: Personalizamos todas sus tarjetas según sus necesidades.
SERVICES_SUBTITLE: Consulte aquí los servicios que ofrece FutureCard
SOLUTIONS_CONTENT: As an end-to-end card manufacturer, mixing technology with security printing craftsmanship, FutureCard covers the complete value chain of design and manufacturing of secure cards. We manufacture cards using a variety of substances, such as PET-G, PET-F, PVC, ABS, PS, Paper Board, etc. to provide our clients with a diverse range of materials they can choose from. At FutureCard, we aim to provide aesthetically attractive cards which are secure at the same time so that our customers are pleased with the card that portrays their brand image and name. Beyond that, FutureCard offers high-end Card Management Systems to provide you complete solutions and keep you worry-free.
SOLUTIONS_DESCRIPTION: We have the perfect solution for your business
SOLUTIONS_END_TO_END_DESCRIPTION: Today’s Payment market is marked by the latest technology and the most convenient End-to-End solutions to make the customers life easier.
SOLUTIONS_END_TO_END_PAYMENT_CONTENT: In the payment field, secure cards are of utmost importance. In today’s swift day and age, people prefer to carry cards rather than cash on their person for reasons of convenience and security. FutureCard, as a certified MasterCard, Visa, UnionPay and PayPak card manufacturer and a certified PCI/DSS card personalization bureau, dedicates itself to serve Banks and financial institutions with all their payment card needs by offering them state-of-the-art, premium quality cards featuring the latest cutting-edge technology.
SOLUTIONS_END_TO_END_IDENTIFICATION_CONT: A person's identity is one of the most critical aspects of their life. In today's day and age, individuals are often asked to provide their identification details for official purposes. However, most people don’t feel comfortable when giving out their information out of the fear that it will be misused. FutureCard understands the concerns regarding identity protection, which is why we have developed the most secure technology for our smart ID cards. Smart ID cards have helped public bodies introduce automated identification systems so that people can move easily from one place to another quickly. However, at the same time, it is also necessary to protect the identities of the citizen’s, which is why FutureCard has helped governmental institutions implement secure, yet efficient card systems to aid freedom of movement securely. Governments trust FutureCard with the production and personalization of their cards used for identification as well as cards for voting and other government related services applications.
SOLUTIONS_END_TO_END_TRANSPORT_CONTENT: A person's identity is one of the most critical aspects of their life. In today's day and age, individuals are often asked to provide their identification details for official purposes. However, most people don’t feel comfortable when giving out their information out of the fear that it will be misused. FutureCard understands the concerns regarding identity protection, which is why we have developed the most secure technology for our smart ID cards. Smart ID cards have helped public bodies introduce automated identification systems so that people can move easily from one place to another quickly. However, at the same time, it is also necessary to protect the identities of the citizen’s, which is why FutureCard has helped governmental institutions implement secure, yet efficient card systems to aid freedom of movement securely. Governments trust FutureCard with the production and personalization of their cards used for identification as well as cards for voting and other government related services applications.
SOLUTIONS_END_TO_END_TELECOM_CONTENT: FutureCard offers a wide range of different transport and access cards to fulfill the needs for every industry related customer. We count among our precious customers a wide range of globally recognized Hotel chains and major transportation authorities among others.
SOLUTIONS_END_TO_END_RETAIL_CONTENT: FutureCard offers a wide range of different transport and access cards to fulfill the needs for every industry related customer. We count among our precious customers a wide range of globally recognized Hotel chains and major transportation authorities among others.
SOLUTIONS_CARD_MANAGEMENT_DESCRIPTION: FC central issuance system is an end to end high volume card issuance system for financial
SOLUTIONS_CARD_MANAGEMENT_CONTENT: FutureCard provides a wide range of card management systems to all of its clients. As we are an end-to-end card solutions provider; we manage everything from the issuance of the cards to their management and enrollment. Once our customers entrust us with their card management needs, we fulfill them with the help of our highly committed team and the best that technology has to offer.
SOLUTIONS_CUSTOMIZE_DESCRIPTION: Create your own design with all the options, material and technologies available in ower market.
